name: Rough Energy (Hakari)
description: Cursed energy with a rough, sandpaper-like texture. Cuts opponents on contact.
howToObtain: Roll 'Rough' trait using Trait Rerolls (1% chance)
tips: Passive damage adds up in long fights. Great for aggressive melee builds.

name: Electric Energy (Kashimo)
description: Cursed energy with properties of electricity. Can stun opponents and build up charge.
howToObtain: Roll 'Electric' trait using Trait Rerolls (1% chance)
tips: Use multi-hit moves to build up the stun proc faster.

name: Corrosive Energy
description: Energy that corrodes defenses over time, reducing enemy damage reduction.
tips: Best used against tank builds to shred their armor.

name: Toxic Energy
description: Poisonous energy that sickens enemies, applying a damage-over-time effect.
tips: Effect stacks up to 3 times for maximum DoT.

name: Dense Energy
description: Heavier, more impact-focused energy. Increases the weight behind your attacks.
tips: The 10% damage buff is simple but effective for any build.
